law.catch_line: Costs of action a lien on premises -- Personalty to be sold first.
law.text: The costs of an action to abate a house of prostitution shall constitute a lien upon the premises and the judgment shall provide for the enforcement of that lien, but any personal property seized under KRS 233.100 shall be sold first and the proceeds applied to the payment of those costs before the realty is sold.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3941m-10.
